name: PickAFlick
0:
”Alexa, launch Pick a Flick”
”Alexa, ask PIck a Flick to Surprise Me”
”Alexa, Ask Pick a Flick to suggest movies like the Godfather”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pick a flick
des:
Pick a Flick is a skill for Amazon Alexa to answer one of the most frutrating questions that mankind has faced - "What do we watch?" 
 
Ever feel like watching a movie similar to the last one? Check ✓
Your partner feels like romance from the 1900s? Check ✓
Feeling bored and listless unsure of what to watch? We've got you covered ✓
With over tens of thousands of movies in our database, we can help you find the perfect movie to watch.

To get started, ask Alexa to 'launch Pick a Flick'.
For similar movie recommendations, ask Pick a Flick, "Suggest a movie like Avengers", or that movie you secretly love but can't seem to admit ;)
For recommendations based on genre and year, ask Pick a Flick, "Suggest action movies released last year".
And if you're feeling lucky, you can never go wrong by asking Pick a Flick, "Surprise me". 
(Psst, if you ever forget what to ask, you can always ask, "What can you do?")

Works with all Alexa enabled devices, so you can pick a flick whether you're in the kitchen or on the go!

If you like the skill, do leave us your thoughts and the comments in the reviews and we will try improve it in the days to come!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
